ai.susi.server.api.aaa

Class ChangeUserRoles

  • java.lang.Object
    • HttpServlet
      • ai.susi.server.AbstractAPIHandler
        • ai.susi.server.api.aaa.ChangeUserRoles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    APIHandler

    public class ChangeUserRoles
extends AbstractAPIHandler
implements APIHandler
    Created by chetankaushik on 30/05/17. This is a servlet that is used to change the role of any user This requires Admin login http://127.0.0.1:4000/aaa/changeRoles this accepts two post parameters- 1. user --> The username of the user whose role is to be modified 2. role --> the new role of the user
